title: Journalist Documents Anti-Semitism In A Swedish City
teaser: Journalist Petter Ljunggren wore a Jewish skullcap and Star of David pendant to covertly film the anti-Semitism he experienced in the Swedish city of Malmo. NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with Ljunggren.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
